|brand = GlobalScale |model = GuruPlug |submodelappend = yes |submodel = Server Plus (US Edition) |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 04/01/2011 |page_start_origon = https://infodepot.fandom.com/wiki/GuruPlug_Server_Luxury |wlclass = G54 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = plug computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = YCJ003GP |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F6281;88F6281A2; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = v5 (Kirkwood) |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz <!-- 800 MHz / 1.0 / 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;K9F4G08U0B-PCB0; |flash1size = 512 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Elpida;E1108AFBG-8E-F; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1121R; |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:50:43 |oui = 00:24:23
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2009.11-rc1;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.32;Debian 5.0.3;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, eSATA 2.0, microSD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = 1 |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 0.5 |pwr_conn = NEMA 1-15P
|serial = yes |jtag = yes
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 2.1 EDR, CMOS battery backup, schematics, block diagram |addchip = USB 2.0 Interface Flash Card Reader Controller;Genesys;GL836;;1;,,, 4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1; |802dot11_protocols = bg
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = nosoup4u |defaultssid = Plug2-uAP-XXXX, |defaultssid_regex = ^Plug2-uAP-[a-f0-9]{4}$, |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = Deb
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 04/23/2010 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = 99 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = AzureWave AW-GH381 |rad1modif = SDIO (module) |rad1chip1 = Marvell;88W8688; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Schematics and a block diagram of the device are available in the FCC docs. :The "Plus" edition is also referred to as "Luxury Edition".
Per the FCC docs... *This device is using the following '''Genesys Logic''' chips :GL836 SD/MMC/MS card reader IC :GL850G USB 2.0 hub IC *The model nubmer is 003-GP11A101. *"SheevaPlug2_F2 V02", "WWW.GLOBALSCALETECHNOLOGIES.COM", :and the '''GlobalScale''' logo is silkscreened on the expansion board. :"0F5V3A", "2010130", and "REV B" is silkscreened on the power supply module.
Additional specifications, per '''GlobalScale''''s product page, are below... *Expansion IFs: 1x eSATA 2.0, 2x USB 2.0, 2x microSD (1x internal, 1x external) *Development IFs: 1x Mini-USB port (n/s A/B type connector), UART, and JTAG :Dimensions (LxWxH): [[Dimensions::95 mm x 65 mm x 48.5 mm]] :Internal power: 5V, 3.0A
{{seealso|GlobalScale Devices}}
